name: Sleep - A Ludum Dare 49 Game
description:
A game made in less than 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 49 Game Jam.

Ludum Dare 49 Theme: Unstable

You play as a child who has trouble sleeping at night and is constantly trying to avoid angering their father.

This game may be played with only the mouse if you choose.

Keybinds:

  • Flashlight - F & Right Click
  • Interact (with your lamp) - Left Click
  • Pause - Escape
